author: Andrew Holleran
title: UPS Makes 117-Year History With Employees Decision
description: United Parcel Service is rolling out an offer never seen before in its 117-year history. It was reported Thursday that UPS is offering buyouts to delivery...
content:
United Parcel Service is rolling out an offer never seen before in its 117-year history.
It was reported Thursday that UPS is offering buyouts to delivery drivers because it's navigating through "an… [+1548 chars]
